content:
Based on the execution logs, here is the updated report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Setup at (41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41, -82)
- Storage chest at (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Iron Production Line 1 at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61)
- Storage chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25, -59)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5)

### Iron Production Line 2 at (-18, -53)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18, -53)
- Storage chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15, -51)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5)

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups for water and steam transfer

### Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserters at (6.5, 13.5) and (10.5, 13.5)
- Connected by belt groups for material transport
- Lab for research

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Always verify item existence in storage before attempting extraction
- Use inspect_inventory() to check available quantities
- Handle cases where required items are not available

### Assertion errors for insufficient materials
- Implement proper inventory checking before operations
- Add fallback logic when required quantities are not available
- Consider implementing a waiting/retry mechanism when resources are insufficient

### Entity status warnings
- Address "no ingredients to smelt" warnings by ensuring proper material flow
- Fix "inserter waiting for source items" by ensuring input materials are available
- Ensure proper fuel supply for burner entities

### Resource shortages
- Monitor and maintain copper plate supply for science pack production
- Ensure continuous iron plate and gear wheel production
- Implement better resource management to prevent production stoppages
